title: 408. Q&AF: Giving Yourself Grace Vs. Making An Excuse, Need To But Can't Hire Someone & Dealing With Frustrations Throughout The Day
itunes:title: 408. Q&AF: Giving Yourself Grace Vs. Making An Excuse, Need To But Can't Hire Someone & Dealing With Frustrations Throughout The Day
description: In today's episode, Andy answers your questions on how to differentiate needing some grace for yourself vs. making an excuse, what to do when you've hit a glass ceiling in your business but cannot afford to hire someone on at the moment, and how to go throughout your day dealing with the all the inevitable frustrations.
